title: Marketing Operations Manager
html:
Role Overview:

The Marketing Operations Manager at eoracle will play a crucial role in optimizing our marketing processes, tools, and technology. You will be responsible for the implementation, management, and analysis of our marketing campaigns across various channels. This role requires a blend of analytical prowess, technical expertise, and a deep understanding of digital marketing strategies to drive growth and increase engagement.

Responsibilities:

  1. Campaign Management: Oversee the execution and management of marketing campaigns, ensuring they are delivered on time and within budget.
  2. Data Analysis and Reporting: Leverage data analytics to track campaign performance, providing insights and recommendations for optimization.
  3. Marketing Technology: Manage and optimize marketing technology stack to improve operational efficiency and campaign effectiveness.
  4. Process Optimization: Develop and implement marketing processes and strategies to streamline operations and enhance productivity.
  5. Lead Generation and Nurturing: Coordinate with the sales and marketing team to ensure a seamless lead generation and nurturing process.
  6. SEO and Content Strategy Support: Collaborate with the content team to support SEO strategies and content marketing initiatives.
  7. Budget Management: Monitor marketing budget and expenditures, ensuring optimal allocation of resources.

Requirements:

  • Proven experience in marketing operations, digital marketing, or a related field.
  • Strong analytical skills with experience in data analysis tools and methodologies.
  • Deep knowledge of marketing automation tools and CRM systems.
  • Proficiency in SEO, content strategy, and social media management.
  • Excellent organizational and project management skills, with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.
  • Strong communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively across teams.
  • Self-motivated with a passion for technology and innovation.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Bachelorâ€™s degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or related field.
  • Experience in the blockchain or tech industry.
  • Familiarity with the latest marketing trends and technologies.
  • Creative problem-solving skills and the ability to think strategically.

As the Marketing Operations Manager at eoracle, you will have the opportunity to shape the operational backbone of our marketing efforts, directly contributing to the growth and success of our innovative blockchain solutions. If you are passionate about marketing, analytics, and blockchain technology, join us in revolutionizing the way decentralized applications interact with the real world.

title: Partnership & BD  Manager
html:
Role Overview:

As a Business Development Manager at eoracle, you'll be pivotal in forging new partnerships and expanding our market presence, particularly within DApps, blockchain chains, and Rollup frameworks. Your role will involve deep technical discussions, managing the customer journey from outreach to integration, and acting as a passionate advocate for our technology. This role is perfect for someone with a STEM background eager to dive into business development, leveraging their technical acumen to drive growth and innovation.

Responsibilities:

  • Engage in technical discussions with potential partners and clients, effectively communicating eoracle's value proposition.
  • Independently manage outbound and inbound pipelines across various industry verticals, focusing on DApps, chains, and Rollup frameworks.
  • Oversee the entire customer funnel, ensuring smooth progress from initial contact to contract finalization.
  • Provide exceptional post-integration support, fostering customer growth through strategic partnerships and marketing initiatives.
  • Represent eoracle at conferences and industry events, enhancing our brand visibility and engaging with the community.
  • Collaborate with internal teams, including product, marketing, and engineering, to align business development strategies with company goals.
  • Regularly update the team on pipeline status, identifying new opportunities for revenue and partnership.

Requirements:

  • Deep technical proficiency and a keen interest in blockchain technology.
  • Ability to conduct technical discussions and negotiations independently.
  • Demonstrated competency in managing early-stage discussions, articulating the benefits of eoracle's technology.
  • Strong organizational skills, capable of managing administrative tasks efficiently.
  • Willingness to travel for conferences and industry events.

Ideal Qualifications:

  • Although not required, a background in crypto, sales, or similar fields is beneficial.
  • Experience or familiarity with DApps, blockchain chains, and Rollup frameworks is highly desirable.

title: Content and Community Lead - Crypto Native | Remote
html:
Role Overview:

As the Content and Community Lead at eoracle, you will be responsible for crafting compelling content that resonates with our target audience and fosters a vibrant community around our brand. You'll oversee the development of content strategies, manage our social media presence, and ensure that our message is consistent and engaging across all channels. This role is perfect for a creative and dynamic individual who is passionate about blockchain technology and has a knack for storytelling.

Responsibilities:

  1. Content Strategy and Creation: Develop and execute a comprehensive content strategy that aligns with eoracle's goals and brand identity. Oversee the production of high-quality content for campaigns, social media, blogs, and partnership enablement.
  2. Community Engagement: Actively engage with our community across social media platforms and blockchain forums. Foster discussions, answer questions, and build a loyal following around eoracle's mission and technology.
  3. Social Media Management: Manage eoracle's social media profiles, creating and curating content that drives engagement and growth. Monitor trends and adapt strategies to maximize reach and impact.
  4. SEO Optimization: Implement SEO best practices to ensure content is discoverable and ranks well on search engines. Regularly analyze and report on content performance and adjust strategies as needed.
  5. Brand Ambassador: Represent eoracle at industry events, conferences, and online forums. Build relationships with influencers, partners, and other key stakeholders in the blockchain community.

Requirements:

  • Proven experience in content marketing, social media management, and community engagement.
  • Strong understanding of SEO principles and content optimization.
  • Excellent writing and editing skills, with the ability to produce engaging and informative content.
  • Deep passion for blockchain technology and familiarity with the blockchain community and trends.
  • Highly organized, with exceptional multitasking and time management skills. "Always online" mentality to stay responsive to community needs and market shifts.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to interact positively with community members and partners.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Experience in the blockchain or tech industry is highly desirable.
  • Demonstrated ability to grow and manage online communities.
  • Creative thinker with ideas for innovative content and community campaigns.
  • Bachelorâ€™s degree in Marketing, Communications, Journalism, or a related field.

title: Junior researcher
html:
Location: On-site, Tel-aviv, Israel

Role Overview

We're seeking a Junior Researcher to help develop and test algorithms, conduct in-depth research on initiatives like slashing, pricing, and consensus, and dive into blockchain data and DApps performance. You'll be instrumental in shaping our product's future, working closely with our senior research team.

Responsibilities

  • Support the development and testing of algorithms for slashing, pricing, and consensus.
  • Analyze blockchain transactions, oracle services, and DApps performance for insights.
  • Research academic articles, technical documentation, and emerging blockchain technologies.
  • Write research articles, technical blog posts, or documentation on eoracle's algorithms.

Requirements

  • Bachelorâ€™s degree (in progress or completed) in Computer Science, Mathematics, Economics, or related.
  • Demonstrated interest in blockchain technology.
  • Strong analytical skills and attention to detail.
  • Proficiency in data analysis tools/methodologies; Python experience is a plus.
  • Interest in cryptoeconomics, DeFi, and blockchain applications.
  • A self-starter attitude, with the motivation to initiate and drive research projects independently.
  • Team player with a proactive attitude.

Dive into blockchain research and help us pioneer solutions in the oracle space. If you're eager to contribute and grow with a leading team, weâ€™re looking for you.

title: Product Analyst
html:
Location: On-site | Tel-aviv, Israel

Role Overview

eoracle is seeking a detail-oriented Product Analyst to analyze market trends, customer feedback, product performance, and particularly on-chain activities and DApps performance. In this role, you will work closely with product management, engineering, and marketing teams to deliver actionable insights that shape our product's future direction and ensure it meets the blockchain community's needs.

Responsibilities

  • Conduct comprehensive market research to identify trends, opportunities, and challenges within the blockchain oracle market.
  • Analyze customer feedback, product usage data, on-chain activities, and DApps performance to derive insights into user behavior and product efficacy.
  • Work with the product team to define and monitor key performance indicators (KPIs), assessing the impact of product features and initiatives.
  • Leverage data-driven insights to support product roadmap planning and strategic decision-making.
  • Generate and present detailed reports to senior management, outlining key findings and proposing strategic actions.
  • Stay updated on blockchain technology advancements and competitor product offerings to ensure eoracle's competitive positioning.

Requirements

  • Bachelorâ€™s degree in Business, Economics, Computer Science, or related field.
  • At least 2 years of experience in a Product Analyst, Business Analyst, or similar role within a tech-focused company, with specific experience in analyzing on-chain data and DApps performance.
  • Proficiency in data analysis tools and methodologies, with a strong analytical mindset.
  • Exceptional communication skills, capable of presenting complex data in a clear and actionable manner.
  • Proactive, independent, and deeply interested in blockchain technology and its applications.

Preferred Qualifications

  • Practical experience with SQL, Python, or other data analysis programming languages.
  • A solid understanding of blockchain technology, especially oracle solutions and the dynamics of decentralized applications.
  • Previous work experience in a startup environment, demonstrating flexibility and adaptability.
  • Ability to solve complex problems and work under tight deadlines.

title: Product Manager & Architect - System
html:
Role Overview:

The Technical Product Manager for system and infrastructure will be responsible for overseeing the development and optimization of eoracle's technical infrastructure. This role demands a deep understanding of system architecture, including microservices, and the ability to work closely with the development team to plan and execute strategic system enhancements. A background in coding, especially within the blockchain industry, although not mandatory, will be highly beneficial for this position.

Responsibilities:

  • Architect and refine eoracle's microservices systems, ensuring scalability, reliability, and security.
  • Collaborate with the development team to deeply understand the system's technical aspects and plan future developments.
  • Translate technical requirements into actionable product roadmaps and feature specifications.
  • Monitor technological advancements in blockchain infrastructure and evaluate their applicability to eoracle's ecosystem.
  • Facilitate communication between product and engineering teams, ensuring alignment on project goals and timelines.

Requirements:

  • Strong background in software development, with proficiency in coding and system architecture.
  • Experience in designing and managing microservices systems, with the ability to architect solutions that meet current and future needs.
  • Ability to work closely with development teams, providing clear direction and understanding complex technical details.
  • Strategic thinker with the capacity to anticipate system requirements and plan accordingly.
  • Excellent communication skills, capable of bridging the gap between technical and non-technical stakeholders.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Experience within the blockchain industry is highly preferred but not mandatory.
  • Familiarity with blockchain technology and its implications for system architecture and infrastructure.
  • Demonstrated ability to lead technical projects and collaborate effectively with a multidisciplinary team.

What We Offer:

  • A chance to contribute to the forefront of blockchain innovation, shaping the infrastructure that powers real-world data integration.
  • An opportunity to work on challenging technical problems, planning and developing infrastructure that supports scalable and secure applications.
  • A front-row seat at a rapidly advancing Israel-based startup thatâ€™s going places.
  • The chance to thrive in a flexible, ever-changing environment where hard work, dedication, and creativity are valued above all.

If this got your gears turning and youâ€™re craving an adventure with a team that gets things done, reach out. Let's see what we can do together.

title: Technical Product Manager
html:
Location: On-site | Tel-aviv, Israel

Role Overview

We are in search of a Product Manager who thrives at the intersection of technology and economics and is passionate about leveraging this connection to optimize system outcomes through effective integration with customers and DApps. This role is perfect for someone curious and eager to explore new fields, ready to embrace the challenges of a fast-paced startup environment and drive forward blockchain innovation.

Responsibilities

  • Lead the strategic integration of eoracle solutions with customers and DApps, focusing on technical compatibility and optimization.
  • Conduct in-depth market research to analyze competitors, understand blockchain ecosystem dynamics, and study DApps mechanism designs.
  • Craft and manage a product roadmap that prioritizes system outcomes and seamless user experiences through strategic DApps integrations.
  • Collaborate with development teams, providing clear guidance on product definitions and priorities that reflect market needs and integration opportunities.
  • Translate complex system functionalities and DApps mechanisms into effective strategies, engaging in technical discussions with internal and external stakeholders.

Requirements

  • 2+ years of product management experience in the deep tech or blockchain sector, with a focus on technological integrations and product outcomes.
  • Bachelor's degree in Mathematics, Computer Science, Economics, or a related field. A strong academic background in these areas is highly preferred.
  • Demonstrated ability to analyze complex systems and DApps mechanism designs.
  • Excellent communication skills, with the ability to demystify and convey intricate concepts.
  • Proven project management skills, capable of juggling multiple projects and market analysis tasks.

Preferred Qualifications

  • Master's degree in a relevant field.
  • A solid grasp of blockchain technology, smart contracts, and decentralized applications.
  • Experience in conducting market analysis and understanding ecosystem dynamics within the blockchain industry.
  • A genuine enthusiasm for deep tech and an unyielding curiosity to explore and master new domains.

What We Offer

  • An opportunity to be at the bleeding edge of blockchain innovation, making significant contributions to the field.
  • A dynamic, fast-paced startup environment where you can expect to be challenged and grow professionally.
  • The chance to work on projects that blend technology with economics, ideal for those passionate about these interconnected fields.

Close enough and up for a challenge? Let's talk

title: Chain - Team Leader (HandOn)
html:
Roles and Responsibilities

  • Lead and mentor a high-performing software engineering team
  • Engage with product managers, business team, and other stakeholders to improve eoracle services
  • Develop the eoracle EMV blockchain following best practices. You will develop and maintain a new EVM blockchain
  • Develop unit tests and increase code coverage
  • Do code review to peers
  • Optimize performance of eoracle blockchain
  • Provide insight on best practices developing secured, efficient and scalable services

Requirements

  • At least 3 years of hands-on experience as a blockchain node software engineer
  • At least 2 years of managing a team of blockchain core software engineers
  • Proficiency in golang programming language
  • Proficiency in consensus algorithm
  • Proficiency in EVM core
  • Strong understanding of development best practices

What we're looking for

The relevant person should have great soft skills co exist with deep technical skills.

Someone that lead a team of software engineer engineers

Someone that really knows the code of Ethereum nodes,

Technology Stack

technology / framework / language / databases priority (1 - 5), 5 is high
Go 5
geth code 5
tendermint code 5
consensus algorithms 5
libp2p 5
network 5
jira 4
github 5
grpc, websocket, rest 5

title: Cloud Security Engineer - Remote / On-site
html:
Location: Israel / Remote

Role Overview

We are seeking an experienced Cloud Security Engineer to fortify our cloud-based infrastructure, focusing on securing our blockchain and oracle solutions. This pivotal role involves crafting and executing secure cloud architectures, particularly in containerized environments like Kubernetes (K8s). Collaborating closely with our development and operations teams, you will integrate security best practices into our DevOps pipeline, playing a critical role in safeguarding our innovative technology.

Responsibilities

  • Develop and maintain secure architectures for our cloud-based infrastructure, with a special focus on blockchain-specific security needs.
  • Implement and manage robust security controls for K8s environments, including comprehensive threat assessments and modeling.
  • Design and enforce strict access controls and identity management solutions within our cloud environments.
  • Lead the deployment of monitoring and logging solutions, analyzing data to swiftly identify and mitigate security incidents.
  • Contribute to the secure development lifecycle of our blockchain solutions, ensuring best practices are integrated from the outset.

The Ideal Candidate

  • Brings at least 5 years of experience in developing secure cloud architectures, preferably with exposure to blockchain technologies.
  • Demonstrates deep knowledge of cloud security principles and best practices, with hands-on experience in K8s security.
  • Proficient in developing security solutions in at least one programming language.
  • Naturally curious and a rapid learner, with a strong interest in blockchain and oracle technologies.

Preferred Qualifications

  • Experience securing multi-cloud environments and familiarity with cross-cloud security challenges.
  • Knowledgeable about common application security issues (OWASP top 10) and how they apply to blockchain-based applications.
  • Skilled in enhancing security across the development lifecycle of complex, distributed applications.
  • Outstanding problem-solving abilities and communication skills, capable of effectively collaborating in a fast-paced and dynamic team.

title: Blockchain Security Researcher - On-site
html:
Location: On-site. | Tel-aviv, Israel

Role Overview

We are seeking a talented and experienced Blockchain Security Researcher to bolster our research team. This role involves conducting thorough research and analysis of blockchain security, focusing on oracle systems, protocols, and the underlying infrastructure. The ideal candidate will possess a solid foundation in cryptography and an expansive understanding of blockchain technologies, contributing to the development of eoracle's state-of-the-art solutions.

Responsibilities

  • Perform in-depth research and security analysis of blockchain systems, with a focus on oracles and related protocols.
  • Develop innovative security solutions and improvements for blockchain-based oracle systems, enhancing their resilience against attacks.
  • Collaborate with development teams to implement security best practices and findings into eoracle's technology stack.
  • Stay abreast of the latest in blockchain security developments, emerging threats, and opportunities for innovation.

The Ideal Candidate

  • Brings at least five years of hands-on experience in cryptography and/or the blockchain field.
  • Holds a University degree in Computer Science (with a high GPA) or a related field, demonstrating a strong foundation in cryptographic protocols.
  • Possesses experience in software development, ideally with proficiency in Python and/or C++.
  • Is inherently curious and a rapid learner, with a passion for delving into complex security challenges.

Preferred Qualifications

  • Experience thriving in a startup environment, adapting quickly to evolving priorities and challenges.
  • Proven track record of writing technical reports and publishing research findings in the field of blockchain security.
  • Demonstrates strong communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively across teams to develop and enhance secure blockchain solutions.
  • Keeps up to date with the blockchain industry's latest developments and security threats.
  • Has experience identifying and remediating low-level vulnerabilities, enhancing the overall security posture of blockchain solutions.

title: OffChain (FullStack) - Sr. Software Engineer
html:
Roles and Responsibilities

  • Engage with product managers, business team, and other stakeholders to improve eoracle services
  • Develop eoracle services following best practices
  • Develop unit tests and increase code coverage
  • Do code review to peers
  • Optimize performance of eoracle services
  • Provide insight on best practices developing secured, efficient and scalable services

Requirements

  • At least 2 years of hands-on experience as a full stack developer.
  • Proficiency in node.js, golang programming languages
  • Experience with React
  • Strong understanding of responsive design principles
  • Experience working with relational databases (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL databases (e.g., MongoDB, Cassandra).

What we're looking for

The relevant person should have great soft skills co exist with deep technical skills.
